Elegant Ruby & Diamond Cuff Bracelet - 'Ratna Kankanam'

₹134,101

Description

This stunning 'Kankanam' blends traditional gemstone appeal with a modern design aesthetic. The high-quality ruby, combined with the brilliant diamonds and rose gold, creates a luxurious and eye-catching piece. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees a lasting shine. It's a durable and timeless investment that showcases both heritage and contemporary style.

Materials

  • 18K Rose Gold
  • Natural Ruby (likely Burmese
  • assumed good color saturation and clarity)
  • Round Brilliant Cut Diamonds (VS clarity
  • G-H color). Features a Hyderabadi polish for exceptional shine.

Features

A modern interpretation of the traditional 'Kankanam', this cuff bracelet features a prominent rectangular-cut ruby as its centerpiece, flanked by meticulously set round brilliant cut diamonds. The openwork design adds a contemporary flair while showcasing the brilliance of the stones. The rose gold provides a warm, contrasting backdrop. Claw Setting is used for the ruby and pavé setting for the diamonds. The clasp is robust and integrated seamlessly into the design.
